name: AtmaSphere
description: AtmaSphere is roll-a-ball game set in a medieval world which is full of dangerous traps and uncertain paths! Roll all you want, but don't fall off! Collect all diamonds to impress Ballerina, and get Ballard safely to her house!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core 2.6 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: R7 360 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
